name: UMMI Images
description: A sorting utility for user photo albums.

name: Doable
description: An app that allowes users to post tasks/jobs or earn extra money by doing a task.

name: Train Scheduler
description: A plain JavaScript math game designed to reinforce a students understanding of order of operations.

name: Nasa Trivia
description: Designed using both NASA's API and the Ope Trivia API to generate space trivia questions based on NASA's photo of the day.

name: Friends Match
description: Take a simple survey and get matched to a friend.
